title: Dealhacker: ALDI Is Flogging A 65-Inch 4K Smart TV For $800
text:
Image: Aldi

Each week, ALDI runs a Special Buys sale in a bid to get shoppers into its stores. This time around, it's selling a huge Android TV for just $800. So if you're looking to pimp out your home cinema, here's all you need to know.

4K TV Showdown: $799 Aldi Vs $9000 LG Today's 4K TVs come in a wide range of prices; from less than $500 to over ten grand. But how much difference does this make to the picture quality? In a bid to find out, we pitted Aldi's ultra-cheap 65-inch 4K TV against one of the most expensive 4K models on the market. We also asked "normal" people if they could tell the difference. Here are the results. Read more

Available from Wednesday 30 October, ALDI's selling a 65-inch 4K smart TV for $799 under its Bauhn badge. It comes with a smart remote powered by Google Assistant, so you can yell your important search commands when you're not bothered searching for things manually. That's pretty handy as typing shows or movie titles via a remote can be tedious at times. The remote also comes with a Netflix and YouTube shortcut button because why not.

Image: Supplied

The TV comes with a one-year warranty so if anything goes wrong, you'll have some peace of mind.

Specs

Display: 65-inch (165cm)

Resolution: 3840 x 2160

OS: Android

Compatible with: Netflix, Google Play, Android TV, YouTube

The specs are a bit light on the website but we've reached out to ALDI for more information and will update when it responds.

What To Know Before Your First Trip To ALDI The Cult of ALDI is real and it is powerful. Fans of the chain love its distinctive approach to the customer experience just as much as they love its low prices, and are quick to evangelise it to everyone they meet. Read more
